welcomeTitle: Hello there, {{ firstName }} {{ lastName }}! It's nice to see you!
productsListTitle: Here is the list of all your products
selectOrderBySubtitle: Select the order you want products to be sorted. ASC represents sorting in ascending order, and DESC represents sorting in descending order.
selectOrderSubtitle: Select the field by which the order (ASC or DESC) will be performed. The default field is the creation date of the product.
noFavoriteProductsTitle: You have not added anything to favorites yet... :(
dashboardProductsNotFound: You have not posted any products yet.
